name: the little tank that could
description:
Solving puzzles with a panzer is fun. This is what critics and players say about 'the little tank that could':

"A fantastic game, and a must have for any iPhone owner: GOLD AWARD" (iPhoneWorld)

"It is amazing, the graphics fit perfectly, the controls are easy to get used to, and the physics are really well done." (Legowiz)

"I have been playing the crap out of it. Cool game." (Dana)

"The physics in the game are incredibly accurate and everything moves and falls exactly as you would expect." (iPhoneWorld)

---

This is a premium panzer puzzler. You steer your panzer through the level using Newtonian physics. Make your tank smash, roll, jump and fly through or over obstacles. And if nothing else helps, just fire your gun. The game features a state of the art physics simulation where each link in the tracks is faithfully simulated using Chipmunk's physics engine. Once you mastered the assault course from start through finish, your time will be recorded so you can make it to the online leader board. Glory awaits those that will master the panzer.

This game currently features 10 levels of action packed fun, ranging from difficulty easy, medium to hard.

tags: little tank, panzer, physics, simulation, tracks, puzzle, assault course.

The little tank that could is a game by Bram Stolk, and it uses Scott Lembcke’s physics engine Chipmunk.
